name: Void Crypt
description:
WASD + Space to attack.

The player is unkillable and there is no menu.

Hi! Thank you for checking out this project. I made it with the intention of putting some sort of contribution towards it every day as I'm in a situation where I can't commit to that I'm releasing what I've created as an early prototype for people to check out!

I plan on making more in the future, I don't know if I'll continue this project (I certainly will if people enjoy it though!) but at the very least I'll be developing something.

Thank you and kindest regards!
